definition[0]: if you are sick, the food in your stomach comes up through your mouth
example[0]: I think I’m going to be sick.
example[1]: He dashed to the bathroom and was sick again.
example[2]: The cat’s been sick on the carpet.
example[3]: You’ll be sick if you eat any more of that chocolate!
example[4]: I was violently sick (=suddenly and severely sick) the last time I ate prawns.
